summary: Smash Mouth is a rock band from San Jose, California, USA.
full_text:
Smash Mouth is an American rock band from San Jose, California. The band was formed in 1994, and was originally composed of Steve Harwell , Kevin Coleman , Greg Camp , and Paul De Lisle . They are known for songs such as "Walkin' on the Sun"  and "All Star" .
The band has adopted retro styles covering several decades of popular music. They have also performed numerous covers of popular songs, including the Monkees' "I'm a Believer", War's "Why Can't We Be Friends?", Simple Minds' "Don't You ", Question Mark & the Mysterians's "Can't Get Enough of You Baby", the Beatles' "Getting Better", and Disney's "I Wan'na Be Like You".
title: Smash Mouth
